== Thodiyoor (CT) (628366) ==

Thodiyoor (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 11.58 sq. km. and harbouring 6344 households with total population of 25884 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 130 km. Male population is 12333 and female population is 13551. Scheduled Caste population is 2450 and Scheduled Tribes population is 36. Census Location Code of the town is 628366<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 130 km. Railway station is at Karunagappally at a distance of 5 km.
